id: Alabama ranked No. 1 in season’s first College Football Playoff poll; Clemson, LSU, Notre Dame Nos. 2-4
paragraph:
GRAPEVINE, Texas (AP) — Alabama ranked No. 1 in season’s first College Football Playoff poll; Clemson, LSU, Notre Dame Nos. 2-4.Help | Press | Advertise With Us | Jobs | RSS | Site Map
